good.text: A crew filming a live episode of a beloved childrens TV show
A bunch of nuns having fun
A stranded mermaid calling for help
A little girl bringing treats to her grandmother

bad.text: An open gateway to hell that will close if hit by a trolley
A camel that will literally not stop spitting on you

modifiers.text: If they die, you'll have to speak at their funeral in front of at least 100 people
If they die, you'll have to clean up the mess
Will be reincarnated as the world's most obnoxious social media influencer
Will be reincarnated as the world's cutest dog
